oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Decision support tool for optimizing semen strategy given various target replacement rates
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Adamchick, J.
Briggs, K.R.
Nydam, D.V.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Breeding and replacement decisions are increasingly complex considering recent advances in technology, management and market opportunities. Our objective was to create a tool to help identify the optimal semen strategy to capitalize on crossbred beef markets while maintaining the replacement supply to supÂ­port lactating herd turnover.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; Vol. 58 No. 58 (2024): 2024 AABP Annual Conference Proceedings; 235
